Matt Swanson

Ruby Learning

Ruby focus right now is on Procs and Lambdas. I'm learning from this module of RubyMonk.com. Here is about where I am right now:

family= ["Matt", "Dana", "Lucy", "Bode"]

def meet_us(fam)
    puts "Meet our family of #{fam.length}."
    yield
end

meet_us(family) {family.each {|f| puts f}}

More soon. So much to learn.
